game.name: Aggressors: Ancient Rome
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A mix of deep gameplay and rich historical flavor, Aggressors: Ancient Rome lets you relive history as the ruler of one of the mighty civilizations of the ancient Mediterranean. Choose one of twenty available factions and conquer the world.
